text:
Hi Sejai.

That is very interesting to hear.

I have written integrations for Salesforce, Zendesk and Freshdesk and they all have some form of CSP settings that allow pre-approval for the front end client to connect a websocket to outside services.

In our case we would have websocket, SDK APIS and  webRTC potentially calling from the sandboxed client front end.

With some work I could potentially shift our SDK operations to your Function calls, but that has potential to have impact in terms of long polling and associated rate limiting.
